div.p: RESEARCH IS IMPECCABLE. FINALLY THE FACTOR TIP OF THE
DAY. Iâ€™M HERE IN BOSTON TO ATTEND A
FUNERAL OF AN OLD FRIEND OF MINE, CHET CURTIS, I WORKED WITH

BECAUSE KNOWING CHET HELPED MY LIFE.
ALL OF US SHOULD RESPECT THE PAST, GOOD AND BAD BECAUSE IT
SHAPED US INTO THE PEOPLE WE ARE TODAY.
YOUR PAST IS YOU, HONOR IT, AND REMEMBER IT.
THAT IS IT FOR THE DAY, CHECK OUT THE FACTOR, FROM ANYWHERE IN
